name: cleaningOption_turnOff
description: This function is used to turn off a specific mode of a robot vacuum cleaner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the cleaning option.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The cleaning mode to turn off.

parameters.name: rvcLocation
parameters.description: The location to turn off the cleaning option.
